name: UpdateBlogAuthorsBatch
description:
Update multiple blog author objects at once.

Use this tool to update multiple blog author objects in HubSpot CMS based on identifiers provided in the request.

parameters.name: updated_blog_authors
parameters.description: A JSON array of objects representing updated blog authors, including necessary identifiers and fields.

value_schema.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Authors.

parameters.name: update_deleted_blog_authors
parameters.description: Set to true to update deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Authors.

value_schema.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Authors.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
